Html:
I'm using  Microsoft office 2007 and the ISO 690 First Name Alternative and I would like to modify it for my thesis. I need the citations to look like:

 

(Gradeva et al., 2011)

Gradeva, R., Petrov ,G. War and Peace in Rumeli, 15th to beginning of 19th century, Analecta Isisiana C. Istanbul : The Isis Press, 2011. c. 332. 978-975-428-358-7.

 

not:

(Gradeva, et al., 2011)

Gradeva, Rosica and Petrov, Goran. 2011. War and Peace in Rumeli, 15th to beginning of 19th century, Analecta Isisiana C. Istanbul : The Isis Press, 2011. c. 332. 978-975-428-358-7.
